comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of packs of peach flavored candy
- y: number of packs of cherry flavored candy

Extracted Constraints:
- Peach Flavoring: 3x \leq 3000
- Cherry Flavoring: 5y \leq 4000
- Peach Must Be More Popular: x \geq y
- At Least 30% Cherry: y \geq 0.3(x+y)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 5x + 4y
